De los mejores juegos que se han creado

This game is revolutionary for so many reasons, making physics part of gaming, introducing the most advanced animations, gameplay, story, sound design, graphics, and more of 2004, made gaming into what it is today. Nobody knows, but it's true, without this game, gaming would be set back years and years. And with Alyx, the same thing... This game is as good as it gets, there will never be a game as good as this, and never will. Buy it now!
a awesome game, but pain in ass to get all the fucking achievements.
bro this was made in like 2004 and it's still fricking amazing
An absolute classic that still holds up today. As always, a 10/10.
good game me gusta valve is good not as good as nintendo tho
Simply amazing! A must-play for anyone.
superb shooter. Still holds up 14 years later, even the graphics.
just no, this game has to be one of the most iconic videos games in video game history and at the same time it was one of the most boring non exciting and non intutive games i have ever played, 3/10
